text: Claire Denis (born April 21, 1946) is a French movie director. In 1988, the first movie directed by Denis, Chocolat, was released. It was nominated for the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival. ==Early life== Denis was born in Paris in 1946, but she was raised in colonial French Africa. When she was 14, she moved back to Paris with her mother to finish her education. Category:1946 births Category:Swiss academics Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from Paris
title: Claire Denis
